comments.comment:
Thank you for pointing out the criminal politicians.

Your biggest service to Sri Lanka was to stand for Law & Order and ensure the implementing the law equally among all citizens within Sri Lanka. 

Thank you sir for your opposition to the criminal and corrupt behavior of our politicians. I am sure the Sri Lankan masses have heard your message and are wanting a change. You have singlehandedly changing the conscience of our people. 

Even though you have been prevented from contesting for the presidency by the corrupt political forces, your message has been embraced by most of our citizens and we thank you for your singular contribution to awaken our people.
comments.author: Ronnie Field
